name: `Amazing Despicable Candy Minion Go-Kart Rush Road Chase - Free
name_original: `Amazing Despicable Candy Minion Go-Kart Rush Road Chase - Free
description:
Boys and girls of all ages! Are you ready for a super sweet racing adventure? It is a race to the finish line in this action packed new game! Beat your friends with Game Center to show them who is the racing king or queen of the Candy Kingdom!

THE RACE:
-Collect the mini cupcakes to unlock special new candy racers!
-Take down the other racers in this epic race!
-Don't forget to dodge the obstacles in the way!

Countless hours of fun, grab this game while it's still free!
